Package az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.controller

Class AuthorController

java.lang.Object
az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.controller.AuthorController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/authors") public class AuthorController extends Object
Controller class for handling author-related requests.

    • listAuthors

      @GetMapping({"","/"}) public String listAuthors(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of authors.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object to add attributes for rendering the view
      Returns:
      list-authors.html view for displaying the list of authors

    • showAddAuthorForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public String showAddAuthorForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for adding a new author.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object to add attributes for rendering the form
      Returns:
      add-author.html view for displaying the add author form

    • addAuthor

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addAuthor(@ModelAttribute("author") Author author)
      Handles the submission of the add author form.
      Parameters:
      author - Author object containing form data
      Returns:
      Redirect URL to display the list of authors

    • showEditAuthorForm

      @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public String showEditAuthorForm(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for editing an existing author.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the author to be edited
      model - Model object to add attributes for rendering the form
      Returns:
      update-author.html view for displaying the update author form or error.html page if author not found

    • updateAuthor

      @PostMapping("/update/{id}") public String updateAuthor(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @ModelAttribute("author") Author updatedAuthor)
      Handles the submission of the update author form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the author to be updated
      updatedAuthor - Updated Author object containing form data
      Returns:
      Redirect URL to display the list of authors

    • deleteAuthor

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteAuthor(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Deletes an author.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the author to be deleted
      Returns:
      Redirect URL to display the list of authors

    • searchAuthors

      @GetMapping("/search") public String searchAuthors(@RequestParam(name="fullName",required=false) String fullName, @RequestParam(name="birthYear",required=false) Integer birthYear, @RequestParam(name="nationality",required=false) String nationality, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Searches for authors based on given criteria.
      Parameters:
      fullName - Full name of the author to search for entered by user
      birthYear - Birth year of the author to search for entered by user
      nationality - Nationality of the author to search for selected by user
      model - Model object to add attributes for rendering the view
      Returns:
      list-authors.html view for displaying the list of authors
